about.summary: Two one-sided tests (TOST) procedure to test equivalence for t-tests, correlations, differences between proportions, and meta-analyses, including power analysis for t-tests and correlations. Allows you to specify equivalence bounds in raw scale units or in terms of effect sizes. See: Lakens (2017) <doi:10.1177/1948550617697177>.

Two one-sided tests (TOST) procedure to test equivalence for t-tests, correlations, differences between proportions, and meta-analyses, including power analysis for t-tests and correlations. Allows you to specify equivalence bounds in raw scale units or in terms of effect sizes. See: Lakens (2017) <doi:10.1177/1948550617697177>.

name: r-toster
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3.4' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-toster
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/TOSTER_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/TOSTER/TOSTER_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bae85b997c290487b31f5876e2ce9fc74d9f83615d18d3c0d601422b38ddacdf

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-jmvcore >=0.8

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-jmvcore >=0.8

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('TOSTER')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('TOSTER')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=TOSTER
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'Two one-sided tests (TOST) procedure to test equivalence for t-tests, correlations,
    differences between proportions, and meta-analyses, including power analysis for
    t-tests and correlations. Allows you to specify equivalence bounds in raw scale
    units or in terms of effect sizes. See: Lakens (2017) <doi:10.1177/1948550617697177>.'

  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
